website_summaries.verdict: Add a touch of elegance to any party with these stunning rose gold balloons.
pros: Pack of 24 balloons comes with beautiful white or rose-gold ribbon
Combination of solid and confetti designs
Balloons are durable and easy to inflate with air or helium
cons: If popped, confetti balloons make quite the mess

customer_reviews.title: Held up exceptionally beautiful high quality balloons!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about how absolutely beautiful these balloons were. Used them for a Rose gold themed baby shower and were the perfect centerpieces! Yes, you will need to run the confetti ones against a carpet or anything that will create static electricity (used my sons buzzed head) and the confetti will stick to the sides as shown in the pics! Held up all night. Sad part was we had to pop threm at the end of the night to clean up the venue and beware the confetti will make a HUGE mess!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful balloons! Be advised that if you buy a helium tank to blow the balloons up on your own you will only get about 12 balloons out of the tank because the latex with the confetti are heavier and takes a bit more helium to get them to float. Overall, they were a great product and I was very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are of a very good quality. I used them for my birthday photoshoot. It was an all-out success! On the way to the photoshoot, I had to put them through my sun roof and so many cars came to complete stops to take pics and videos! They were so gorgeous! The confetti ones stole the show. They are still holding up with air! I didnt use helium due to the shortage.
customer_reviews.author: PAJ

customer_reviews.title: True rose gold
customer_reviews.text: These were the hit at the party, and everyone commented how beautiful they were. The colors are a true rose gold, and the confetti balloons were amazing and worked perfectly. I will only buy from party royal from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Very large balloons, make sure you have plenty of helium available if filling at home (recommend tank capable of filling 36-48 reg balloons). Great quality. Unfortunately, my pack arrived with 2 balloons with the 'confetti' outside of the balloons, was not able to stick back inside. Nonetheless, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Torres

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These rose gold balloons by Party Royale are so pretty! They have that perfect pink with a hint of gold sheen to them that I adore. I also love how clever the confetti balloons are. The balloons themselves are durable and easy to inflate. The instructions the company includes in a follow-up email are easy to follow and very thorough. Party Royale will definitely be my go-to for party balloons!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn1230

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tons of helium required!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and I love the size and color... BUT they took a ton of helium to inflate all the way (extra cost) and no matter what we did, we could not get the ones with the confetti to stay up so we had to tie those ones to polls. They were still cute though. And warning- if the confetti ones get popped or torn it goes everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and as described
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were super cute and great quality. They are larger than the "average" balloon so they stand out. There was a substantial amount of confetti inside the clear balloons so they were more visible. You do have to rub the balloons with a cloth to produce static so that the confetti will stick to it. But as I mentioned there was a substantial amount of the confetti so even if they did not all stick to the sides....it was still very visible and really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nazanin Bagherzadeh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality balloons
customer_reviews.text: The balloons and confetti instead were large and high quality. Beautiful and everyone loved the balloons. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Keir

customer_reviews.title: Wont float. See review
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews. The weight of the confetti inside is way too much. This causes all the problems with buoyancy. If you remove half the confetti or use pure helium its perfect. Btw "baloon gas/ballon helium" isnt pure. Its mostly air mixed in to protect kids from suffocating when inhaling it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughters bachelorette party. They are beautiful and quality is as good as description and photos show. Delivery was very quick and would definitely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby showers!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my sisters baby shower! Exactly as advertised. Was hoping for more so i guess ill have to buy a few more :)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting balloons!
customer_reviews.text: I love these balloons! They were easy to inflate with a little stretching first and they are huge! I read the description of 18in but it didn't register just how big that is. They also hold their air for a really long time (I'm talking weeks...)! I also appreciated the email the seller sent with helpful hints on how to get the confetti to stick to the sides. It works!
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great value!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons we're a huge hit at my friend's bridal shower! All of the guests couldn't stop asking where o got them from, and the kids enjoyed playing with the confetti ones after the party was over. Just a forewarning though, these balloons are much bigger than expected, so if transporting it would be a good idea to have an SUV or at least someone to hold them out of the way while driving.
customer_reviews.author: thatkewlkid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, but more matte than shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for our wedding anniversary, they were beautiful. Not as “sparkly” as I thought, a little more matte color but still looks like picture.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Pease

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: We used these on our daughter’s quinceañera for the candy bar. Good quality. Use good helium or the ones with the stuff inside them will not float.
customer_reviews.author: yoanny batista

customer_reviews.title: Color off and don’t float
customer_reviews.text: Honestly very disappointed in these. I ordered them for my grandmas surprise 75th birthday party. The white balloons with confetti didn’t float, no matter how much confetti I took out or how much helium I put in them. The “rose gold” were more of an red orange and I only got two to float. I would advise against ordering them and go with another option
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These balloons looked spectacular for my daughter's birthday. They are huge and the colors are vivid and beautiful. The confetti balloons are amazing and it's easy to get the confetti to stick to the sides. Every balloon inflated perfectly and they've lasted for days. They even came with pretty ribbon. Definitely exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, great quality, plenty of confetti. Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality and price. Thank you! Refreshing to receive quality product for reasonable price. * make sure you rub balloons to create static to maximize the confetti effect inside the balloons - follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: wen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classy decorations
customer_reviews.text: I took these balloons to Barbados for an 18th birthday party. They were beautiful-no problems with inflating them and they lasted the entire night. The birthday girl was very happy with the decorations (it would have been difficult to find anything similar on the island), which were again, beautiful and very durable. I would certainly order from Party Royale again. Thank you for checking in-everything went great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Confetti Balloons DON'T float
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were quite lovely and would have been the perfect vibe for an anniversary party I had this past weekend. However, the confetti balloons did not float. I went through THREE large helium tanks trying to figure out why they wouldn't float. The amount of money I spent on helium to try to get this product to float was very disappointing. Colors were beautiful but functionally, this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ERB

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great value.... Can't wait to use these for my daughters sweet sixteen party. She is gonna love it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Love the fancy rose gold color!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful balloons! Amazing quality of balloons as they last super long and you can't beat the price! The rose gold color is elegant. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: doraine motzell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are beautiful. The only reason they aren't 5 stars is because the ones with confetti are too heavy to stay up great.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Obringer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Great balloons! They were super cute and served their purpose well. They didn’t stay inflated long (about a day), but we only needed them for a few hours
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Leamon

customer_reviews.title: Pop Pop pop goes your ballon
customer_reviews.text: Every last one of the ballons with CONFETTI popped . I spent 1 hr sweeping up CONFETTI at an event . I was embarrassed and had to keep apologizing to guests
customer_reviews.author: luminousFilippa

customer_reviews.title: loved!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the balloons, and I followed the directions that they sent over once i received them. We didn't purchase the special helium stuff, but we chose to blow it up ourselves then the rest helium. The confetti stuck just like it said it would, however the balloons deflated pretty quickly using this method. Next time I'll get some of that helium additive. The balloons were absolute gorgeous and perfect for the event i was putting on!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Aweful. The solid color balloons were fine but the ones with confetti, which was the reason for buying these, had too much confetti in them, making them too heavy to float with helium. We wasted so much time trying to get most of the confetti out.
customer_reviews.author: Melshary Arias

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all the color advertised nor metallic looking. I ordered two different brands of similar style balloons these not only popped very easily, the color was way off and the clear balloons were very cloudy
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted!
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't use these actually but ordered for a friend and she said they'd been perfect and loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Could not get these blown up by any store
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. No party store would touch them. I didn't want to buy a helium tank.
customer_reviews.author: Diglus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This are 18 inch- and amazing!! I ordered these and a bunch of 12 inches... these made the 12 inch look like garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Helium doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Recently used these balloons for my daughter’s bridal shower. The size was perfect as the room was large. Lots of positive feeedback from guests. My daughter loved them! Had them blown up the morning of which I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! The smell was driving us nuts!!! The color is absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cielo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to use two of the rose gold balloons, the helium was being wasted by the oversized openings no matter how hard I worked to hold them shut while filling them. The confetti-filled balloons were so overstuffed they were heavier than the helium. Even after removing most of the confetti, they still wouldn’t float. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Skalla

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient but good product
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and large BUT you have to get them blown up with pure helium NOT the store bought ones which is very inconvenient and I needed up having to return them. But they were good quality and came in reasonable amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I Would Like a Refund
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company offered a refund. they said you need high quality helium, which i think kroger would use (where i got mine filled) -but my balloons deflated within an hour. good customer service I paid $25 to have these inflated at a store and within an hour they were flat. I wish I could send the deflated balloons back!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy i purchased these balloons, they were noticeable bigger then the regular 12 inch balloons, plus they were pretty!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Graham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful balloons! Great quality! Just make sure you fill them large, otherwise the confetti ones won’t float.
customer_reviews.author: JULIANA D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, some of them last more than two months
customer_reviews.author: Pei

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. But the confetti does fall to the bottom. We had the balloons on the ceiling so it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color!
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were perfect! The bride to be loved them! Many compliments were received on the wedding shower decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McGhee

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are Beautiful and very different. They will accentuate any event
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great quality balloon set
customer_reviews.text: The balloons look great. Everything is in the package as described. Balloons seem to hold air as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Joy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful balloons! The only issue I had was the confetti not sticking to the inside quite like I wanted but I’m pretty sure that was user error more than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cornman

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These were absolutely HUGE. They were great and the rose gold was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KHooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party Decor! Any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This is not the full size! I couldn’t blow them all the way up I ordered so many the wouldn’t fit in my small car! They are gorgeous!!! Everyone loved them and took pics of them! Wish I had more without people included! Buy these! Will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: DivaRuss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to party
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these balloons and was able to use them for a friend’s birthday party. Not only were they easy to decorate with, they also added an additional level of classiness to our dinner. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Caron Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Amazing balloons
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are beautiful and amazing! Great for parties and any other occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: I know she will be very happy with these colors
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sisters graduation party. I know she will be very happy with these colors. These are very cute and cheerful! =)
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these balloons and I must say it was a great value for the quality (and quanity) of balloons you receive! I love the elegant rose gold color. It adds class to any event! Be sure to check your email after ordering for tips on how to use the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful balloons! I wish this brand had other colors or kits because i would definitely buy from them! I've booked marked this product so when i run out i can re order them!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Worst balloons ever! Bought these for my daughters bridal shower and was so dissapointed they would not stand up even after filling them with helium. Waste of money and was sad we didn't have any pretty balloons on our tables.
customer_reviews.author: Marie  Avila

customer_reviews.title: Package does not include stated quantity of balloons
customer_reviews.text: This item states that there are 24 balloons in the package; we arrived at MY DAUGHTER'S WEDDING SHOWER, opened the package to inflate only to find there were ONLY 14 balloons!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition to my baby shower
customer_reviews.text: It was a great addition to my baby shower Really liked the color
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I am pleasantly surprised. High quality and great color!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty balloons
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are so pretty in the package. I won’t get to inflate them until September but I look forward to see what they look like. I also received an email on how to blow them up and how to separate the confetti.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Dumatrait

customer_reviews.title: The glitter ballons do not float at all
customer_reviews.text: Of the twelve glitter balloons in the package only two floated. Paid to have them blown up and all ten of the others were duds within a couple hours. The rose gold ones were beautiful and would definitely buy those separately but wasted my money on the combo.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were very pretty and worked great for our engagement party. The glitter/foil tends to settle at the bottom but we didn’t mind
customer_reviews.author: Corgi Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality balloons
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors , especially the confetti balloons. Used it for a balloon arch which everyone complimented.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkey Patel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these balloons for our daughter's 16th birthday party. The colors were beautiful and just as described in the picture. They are heavy duty balloons and excellent quality! The confetti balloons were so pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gottschalk

customer_reviews.title: Great balloons!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the balloons. They arrived on time and were huuge and beautiful just like the picture shows. Very pleased:)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Balloons!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this for my sister's baby shower and the arch was made the night before/morning between the family by learning from youtube videos. The balloons were a gorgeous touch to the arch and they were really easy to use. Would definitely recommend and order again. We got so many compliments and the arch turned out exactly as we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Matos 01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They went perfect with my rose gold colored baby shower
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a baby shower. These balloons are gorgeous!! If you rub the balloons against something once it is inflated (causing static) the confetti sticks to the ballon all over instead of just the bottom of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay corwin

customer_reviews.title: Loved them. The clear with confetti definitely need more ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. The clear with confetti definitely need more helium to hold them up but otherwise they looked amazing on our cake table.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren ossman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty balloons
customer_reviews.text: Love these balloons. Easy to inflate and the gold circles inside are fun.
customer_reviews.author: N. Khosla

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are great, amazing quality! I wasn’t expecting them to be as durable as they were. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarakategarner

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best balloons I've bought
customer_reviews.text: The colors are just beautiful, and the quality is impressive. Very durable, and really nice size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Beauuuuuutiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the price and made everything that much prettier
customer_reviews.author: Maris

customer_reviews.title: Almost ALL the balloons had pinholes in them and leaked when inflated!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Almost ALL the balloons had pinholes in them and leaked when inflated!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confetti ballons wouldn't stay up
customer_reviews.text: Despite using helium, the confetti balloons, were too heavy and wouldn't float up. We had to lay them down on the table. The balloons without confetti in them stayed up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Marion C. Nole

customer_reviews.title: Looked elegant and easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: The various balloons looked great and were so easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Platt

customer_reviews.title: Great Balloons!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the balloons - for sweet 16 birthday party; I'd definately buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars since they looked so beautiful in my baby shower. The color was beautiful and it really made my backdrop pop. They were strong and not easy to deflate. They lasted till the following day and they stand the entire night without deflating.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: LOVE... Confetti Balloons
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and Add so much to a basic party set up.. Stunning !! We did this one as a basic just to see what we were dealing with.. Now, Starting our party business..
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors were amazing! My friend's daughter was in love with them and they matched her dress perfectly
customer_reviews.author: KBVE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were beautiful. They are large so they required a ton of helium or they won't float. We loved them though.
customer_reviews.author: hollie

customer_reviews.title: The confetti is too heavy so they don’t float very ...
customer_reviews.text: The confetti is too heavy so they don’t float very well. They also make a huge mess if/when they pop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: We loved these balloons! Very high quality. It looked so pretty. Just the downside, very hard to clean after because the confetti's would make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the balloons! Used at a retirement part and lots of compliments. They are very sturdy balloons which was perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Loved the balloons!
customer_reviews.text: Balloons looked wonderful!! We used them for graduation party matched our other decor! We had our local flower shop fill them with helium. Great product!!

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Beautiful Balloons
customer_reviews.text: High quality, premium balloons. Exactly as described & beautiful when inflated.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for! Colors were true and great. Great addition for our rose champagne engagement party.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Balloon
customer_reviews.text: Great balloons for the price! Vibrant color. Used them for a garland outside and they held up to the Florida heat beautifully. Will be purchasing again.

customer_reviews.title: Love these balloons!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were fantastic! I used them in my sister bridal shower, and it fit perfectly with the rose gold champagne theme! Highly reccomend!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Well Packaged!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are great for an upcoming party! The quality is durable and the balloons seems to last! Great product!

customer_reviews.text: The balloons are huge and the ribbon it came with as too weak to hold them. It was $40 to full them and the ribbons broke and they blew away.

product_meta.title: Rose Gold Balloons & Rose Gold Confetti Balloons Pack of 24 - Large 18 INCH Premium Latex Balloons Perfect for Rose Gold Party Decorations, Birthday Party, Bridal Shower, Baby Shower, Weddings, Engagements
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL DECOR FOR ANY OCCASION - Turn your party into an event to remember with these elegant ROSE GOLD balloons! This set combines Amazon’s Top Rated Rose Gold balloons, bundled for your convenience. Our customers love these balloons for wedding decorations, birthday party decorations, engagement party decorations, baby shower decorations, Quinceañera decorations, bridal shower decorations, graduation party decorations, prom decorations, and more!

BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK - You will get 24 large rose gold balloons AND 2 spools of rose gold and white ribbon (64 feet total). These balloons are a HUGE 18 INCHES and larger than the typical 12 inch competitors—you will most certainly hear “WOW!” when party goers see these balloons. Each set comes with 12 wonderful solid Rose Gold balloons and 12 Rose Gold Confetti Balloons.

CONFETTI THAT STICKS - Each balloon comes PRE-FILLED with beautiful Rose Gold foil confetti that will actually stick to the inside of the balloon. For an optimal party experience please fill balloons to FULL 18 inches (but not beyond because they will pop)! Use PURE HELIUM to fill your confetti balloon, build static and spread the confetti on the inside walls so that they will float. Cheaper (mixed air or at-home tanks) helium is not strong enough to keep the confetti balloons afloat.

PREMIUM BALLOONS THAT LAST - Party Royale balloons are made with durable helium strength latex and rigorously tested to ensure you have the best experience for your party. Don't believe us? Check out what other happy customers have said in the reviews below.

PARTY ROYALE MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If for any reason you are unhappy with the purchase of any of our sets, please CONTACT US so we can make it right for you! We set out to make great products and only want the best for our customers. We offer 100% money back guarantee, no questions asked, so rest assured when you buy from us.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
